div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p:
Students are empowered and encouraged to reach their personal best.
Enroll Now

East Washington School Corporation wants to welcome you to a new school year and a brand new web space for the Musketeer community. East Washington replaces its old website with a new site that will bring our schools, students and teachers to the forefront of the 21st century.

div.p:
I would like to take this opportunity to welcome you to East Washington School Corporation. Please take an opportunity to visit the pages of each of our schools. We have a lot of exciting things happening at EWSC from a state of the art K-12 steam program, to free breakfast and lunch for all elementary students, to a nationally recognized middle school. Come be a part of the excitement! Our mission is to Encourage and Empower Students to reach their personal best. Our vision is to Achieve Excellence. If at any time you have questions or concerns, please contact us!
Dennis

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(248, 251, 252); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);;font-size: 20px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.p: To anonymously report a crisis or incident of bullying at East Washington, please call 967-3926 and press 7. Please leave a detailed message covering the type of bullying that is taking place. An East Washington administrator will address the report as soon as possible.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
